column1:
Read what i sent you and you will understand. They had only breen counting new cases of new coronary pneumonia NOT total NEW cases of Coronavirus (COVID-19)
They will now include non pneumonia cases.

Steve i have been trying to tell you for a while the Hubei report was only for new cases of new coronary pneumonia added in Hubei Province...NOT total NEW cases of Coronavirus (COVID-19).
They will now include the non pneumonia cases as well.
They are STILL only reporting new cases of PNEUMONIA associated with Coronavirus.
Plus they are only reporting new cases of Coronavirus PNEUMONIA...
Steve please not they are still only reporting cases of new Coronavirus PNEUMONIA. Non pneumonia cases are NOT being reported. pic.twitter.com/vvL5XkFfHg
